createdConfirmationDialog.title: Create
createdConfirmationDialog.description: Do you want to leave? Your changes have not been saved.

modifiedConfirmationDialog.title: Modify
modifiedConfirmationDialog.description: Do you want to leave? Your changes have not been saved.

domain.title: Allowed Domains
domain.description: Specify which browser domains can be trusted to safely upload files. When you create policies to scan for sensitive file uploads, the selected domains will not trigger policy violations.

warning.delete_one: Do you want to delete this domain? This domain is currently being used by {{count}} Avert policies.
warning.delete_many: Do you want to delete this domain? These domains are currently being used by {{count}} Avert policies.

validation.verificationText: You can verify if the server is using the root CA
validation.verificationToolTip: To check whether this domain uses an existing trusted certificate, click Verify. You can add more certificates in Settings > Trusted certificates.

domain.enabledSwitcher: Enable domain for use in policy

whitelistEmailDomains.title: Allowed Email Domains
whitelistEmailDomains.description: Specify your internal email domains. When you create policies to scan for sensitive data, the domains that you add will be considered safe.
whitelistEmailDomains.helperText: Use commas to separate multiple domains

dataCollectionSettings.title: Data Collection
dataCollectionSettings.description: Configure what evidence should be collected for data exfiltration events.

ui_tenant_setting_isSnippetReported.heading: File Snippets
ui_tenant_setting_isSnippetReported.title: Generate File Snippets
ui_tenant_setting_isSnippetReported.description: Include file snippets that contain the sensitive content as part of any data exfiltration events. This content will be viewable in the Avert Events in your organization by users with the sensitive file summary viewing permissions.

ui_tenant_setting_uploadEvidenceFile.heading: Evidence File Collection
ui_tenant_setting_uploadEvidenceFile.title: Enable evidence file collection
ui_tenant_setting_uploadEvidenceFile.description: Save a full copy of files that are involved in data exfiltration events. These files will be saved in your evidence locker and accessible to users in your organization that have sensitive file content permissions.

ui_tenant_setting_tempFileFolderSize.description: Evidence files can be cached for a period of time on remote devices before they are uploaded to your evidence locker. This setting specifies the maximum amount of free disk space that is allocated to this cache.

ui_tenant_setting_uploadOnMobileNetwork.title: Allow file uploads on mobile network
ui_tenant_setting_uploadOnMobileNetwork.description: For enabled devices, allow file uploads on mobile networks in addition to Wi-Fi and wired networks.

ui_tenant_setting_bandwidthLimit.title: Limit bandwidth for file upload
ui_tenant_setting_bandwidthLimit.description: Devices may upload large amounts of data if there are very large evidence files. You can limit the amount of bandwidth available for upload to not impact performance.

ui_tenant_setting_transferWindowStartTim.title: Data Transfer Time
ui_tenant_setting_transferWindowStartTim.description: Schedule when data uploads should occur. Note that if you specify only certain hours, files associated with data exfiltration events will not be accessible to your administrators until the times that you specify.  All times are local to the device that uploads the files.

validation.percentValue: The value must be from 0 to 100.

ui_tenant_setting_uploadDirectlyToS3.heading: File upload
ui_tenant_setting_uploadDirectlyToS3.description: Select Direct if devices on your network can upload files directly to your evidence locker. Select BlackBerry Proxy Service if direct access to your evidence locker is blocked (for example, by your firewall), and BlackBerry will upload the files through its cloud.
ui_tenant_setting_uploadDirectlyToS3.title: File Upload Method

ui_file_setting_evidenceFileRetentionPer.heading: Evidence file retention
ui_file_setting_evidenceFileRetentionPer.description: Configure how long evidence files should be stored in your evidence locker. Files will be removed automatically after the specified time.
ui_file_setting_evidenceFileRetentionPer.title: Data retention

setting.unexpectedErrorWithHttpMessage: The request could not be processed. Returned HTTP status: {{status}}
setting.domainNameErrorMessage: A domain with this name already exists.

trustedCertificates.description: Trusted certificates are used to verify the allowed domains you have added in the Avert Settings.
